defaultMessage: You may be contacted by riders going the same way. If you enabled Facebook as a method of contact, do actively check your Friend requests and messages
If you have an open offer, we may send you emails periodically to tell you of new matches.
Carpool requests from riders that match you are shown here. You can also check the main page to search for riders.
There is no one matching your travel locations. Check back later!
We will try to match you with anyone travelling from the same states.
